creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones
description: man with bushy hair, head tilted to the side, holding a bagpipe; mountains in background
inscription: Inscribed in margins, in brown ink: various notes and inscriptions
markings: Possible collector\'s mark, LLC, below the image, stamped in red ink: A M (intertwined)
medium: Lithograph with annotations in brown ink
provenance: (Armstrong Fine Art, Chicago); sold to MIA, 2004.
signed: Signed and inscribed LRC, in brown ink: Bon à tirer / Gavarni
title: La Musette (The Bagpipe Player)
